feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 22 Sep 2023 08:03:37
entry.summary:
Report:

Tech:
- You Are Holding It Wrong 2: Apple Confirms Finger Smudge Marks on Titanium iPhone 15 Pro Only Temporary
- Key point: Apple confirms that finger smudge marks on the Titanium iPhone 15 Pro are only temporary.
- Insight: This reassures users that the smudge marks are not permanent and can be easily wiped off.

- Elevate Your Typography: Adding Custom Fonts in Next.js 13 with Tailwind CSS
- Key point: Next.js 13 now allows users to add custom fonts to their typography with Tailwind CSS.
- Insight: This feature enhances the design options for developers and improves the overall user experience.

Business:
- Katie Haun believes now is a good time to invest in crypto
- Key point: Katie Haun, a prominent figure in the crypto industry, believes that now is a favorable time to invest in cryptocurrencies.
- Insight: This endorsement from a respected individual in the industry may influence more people to consider investing in crypto.

- And the winner of Startup Battlefield at Disrupt 2023 is… BioticsAI
- Key point: BioticsAI emerges as the winner of the Startup Battlefield competition at Disrupt 2023.
- Insight: This recognition highlights the potential and innovation of BioticsAI, positioning them as a promising startup in the industry.

AI:
- Factors Assessing Science’s Self-Presentation model and their effect on conservatives’ and liberals’ support for funding science
- Key point: A study examines the factors that influence conservatives' and liberals' support for funding science based on Science's Self-Presentation model.
- Insight: Understanding these factors can help bridge the gap between different political ideologies and promote bipartisan support for scientific research.

- An inference model gives insights into innate immune adaptation and repertoire diversity
- Key point: An inference model provides insights into the innate immune system's adaptation and diversity.
- Insight: This research contributes to a better understanding of the immune system and its potential applications in healthcare and disease prevention.

Summary of Insights:
- The temporary nature of finger smudge marks on the Titanium iPhone 15 Pro reassures users about the device's durability and aesthetics.
- The addition of custom fonts in Next.js 13 with Tailwind CSS enhances design options for developers and improves user experience.
- Katie Haun's endorsement of investing in crypto may encourage more individuals to enter the cryptocurrency market.
- BioticsAI's victory in the Startup Battlefield competition highlights their potential as an innovative startup.
- Understanding the factors that influence support for funding science can help bridge political divides and promote scientific research.
- The inference model for innate immune adaptation contributes to a better understanding of the immune system's diversity and potential applications.
